      • merge

        public LeafTile merge(InternalTile parent,
                      InternalTile grandparent,
                      LeafTile l)
        Merges four sibling tiles into a single leaf tile. The parent internal tile of the four sibling tiles becomes a leaf tile of the same depth and at same location. Merge will not be performed if current depth >= maxDepth. This error checking is done in main method.
        Specified by:
        merge in interface Tile
        Parameters:
        parent - of leaf tile on which method is called
        grandparent - of leaf tile on which method is called
        l - - leaf tile on which method is called
        Returns:
        new leaf tile

      • rotate

        public Tile rotate(InternalTile parent,
                   int location)
        Rotate is a method called only on internal tiles.
        Specified by:
        rotate in interface Tile
        Parameters:
        parent - of tile on which method is called
        location - of tile on which method is called
        Returns:
        the tile on which rotate is called in new rotated position

      • isLeaf

        public boolean isLeaf()
        Description copied from interface: Tile
        Returns a boolean value based on data type
        Specified by:
        isLeaf in interface Tile
        Returns:
        true if tile is a LeafTile and false if tile is an InternalTile

      • split

        public InternalTile split(InternalTile parent)
        Split divides tile into four leaf tiles. If an internal tile is split, that internal tile is returned. If a leaf tile is split, the parent of that original leaf tile is returned. It will be grandparent to the four new leaf tiles. Split will not be performed if current depth <= minDepth. Error checking will be done in main method.
        Specified by:
        split in interface Tile
        Parameters:
        parent - of tile to split
        Returns:
        Parent tile of original leaf tile (Grandparent of new four leaf tiles)

      • swap

        public LeafTile swap(java.lang.String s,
                     Tile root)
        Description copied from interface: Tile
        Swap exchanges the location of the tile with an adjacent tile. The two tiles may or may not have a common parent, however they must be adjacent spatially and must have the same depth.
        Specified by:
        swap in interface Tile
        Parameters:
        s - String command for direction of swap
        root - - root of quadtree
        Returns:
        leafTile in its swapped position
